definition: to explore/to survey/to prospect (for oil etc)/prospecting
to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward

sentences.english: It is used for petroleum exploration and engineering tasks such as simulating aircraft designs.
sentences.chinese: 用於石油勘探和工程任務，如模擬飛機的設計。

sentences.english: The geology effect of 3-D seismic exploration in HK area, Jianghan region is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介紹江漢HK地區三維地震勘探的地質效果。

sentences.english: It is suggested that the front blanket sand in a fan-delta is a…
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，前緣席狀砂是良好地油氣勘探目標。

sentences.english: The party, however, carried out a thorough reconnaissance of K2 from south to north-east.
sentences.chinese: 然而探險隊從南到東北對喬戈裏峯完成了徹底的勘探。

sentences.english: Yongdeng sag's exploration degree is lower, which is main body of deposition and hydrocarbon source in this area.
sentences.chinese: 永登凹陷勘探程度較低，爲盆地沉積和生烴主體。

sentences.english: Consequently, the prospecting type of Jiangcang is "the third kind and the third type".
sentences.chinese: 確定江倉勘探類型爲“三類三型”。

sentences.english: Exploration degree for Yongdeng sag is lower, which is main body of deposition and hydrocarbon source.
sentences.chinese: 永登凹陷勘探程度較低，爲盆地沉積和生烴主體。

sentences.english: Target region is a Oil-Gas exploration of blank region.
sentences.chinese: 研究區屬油氣勘探的空白區。

sentences.english: The line spacing will generally be greater in searching for oil than in mining exploration.
sentences.chinese: 測線間距，一般地說在尋找石油時要比礦物勘探中大。

sentences.english: It is suggested that the front blanket sand in a fan-delta is a good target for petrole…
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，前緣席狀砂是良好地油氣勘探目標。

sentences.english: Department of Geology and Mineral Resources of North China Petroleum Geological Exploration Bureau census …
sentences.chinese: 地質礦產部華北石油地質局第三普查勘探大隊修配廠。

sentences.english: Petroleum exploration of deep-buried reservoir is the new realm of hydrocarbon resources in Jianghan Basin.
sentences.chinese: 江漢盆地深層油氣勘探是油氣資源的新領域。

sentences.english: The prospecting team traversed far and wide in search of mineral deposits.
sentences.chinese: 地質勘探隊爲尋找礦藏而走遍四面八方。

sentences.english: On these points, the Upper Permian reef limestones in Liuqiao area would be of significance for the future exploration of oil and natural gas.
sentences.chinese: 研究區上二疊統礁灰巖是值得注意的油氣勘探遠景區。

sentences.english: It is concluded that the major prospecting strata are the Permian Maokou Formation in this area.
sentences.chinese: 提出本區勘探的主要目的層是二疊系茅口組。

definition: to prospect/to dig for coal or minerals
to extract (ore or other resource from a mine)/to exploit/to mine
to dig out/to excavate/to scoop out
